description: Given a text in natural language text with statements or arguments, a type of formal logic to use for parser syntax and analysis (options 'Propositional', 'FirstOrder' or 'Modal'), converts the natural language text into a parsable belief set using the appropriate syntax, for further execution by the Tweety reasoner engine

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The natural language text to convert

parameters.name: logicType
parameters.description: The type of logic to use for conversion: available options are 'Propositional', 'FirstOrder' or 'Modal'
